Chris Bosh

Christopher Wesson Bosh Twitter: chrisbosh

(CB4, The Boshtrich, Boshasaurus, King of the Dragons)

Position: Center and Power Forward Shoots: Left

6-11, 235lb (211cm, 106kg)

Born: March 24, 1984 (Age: 39-127d) in Dallas, Texas us

College: Georgia Tech

High School: Lincoln in Dallas, Texas

Recruiting Rank: 2002 (5)

Draft: Toronto Raptors, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2003 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 29, 2003

Hall of Fame: Inducted as Player in 2021 (Full List)

Career Length: 13 years

Transactions

June 26, 2003: Drafted by the Toronto Raptors in the 1st round (4th pick) of the 2003 NBA Draft.

July 10, 2010: Traded by the Toronto Raptors to the Miami Heat for a 2011 1st round draft pick (Norris Cole was later selected) and a 2011 1st round draft pick (Jonas Valaninas was later selected). Toronto also received a trade exception from Miami. This was the same 1st round draft pick that Toronto had previously traded to Miami on February 13, 2009.

July 30, 2014: Signed a multi-year contract with the Miami Heat.

July 4, 2017: Waived by the Miami Heat.

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Chris Bosh?

Chris Bosh is 39 years old.

Where was Chris Bosh born?

Chris Bosh was born in Dallas, Texas.

When was Chris Bosh born?

Chris Bosh was born on March 24, 1984.

How tall is Chris Bosh?

Chris Bosh is 6-11 (211 cm) tall.

How much did Chris Bosh weigh when playing?

Chris Bosh weighed 235 lbs (106 kg) when playing.

Is Chris Bosh in the Hall of Fame?

Chris Bosh was inducted to the Hall of Fame as a Player in 2021 (Full List) .

When was Chris Bosh drafted?

Chris Bosh was drafted by Toronto Raptors, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2003 NBA Draft.

What position did Chris Bosh play?

Center and Power Forward.

When did Chris Bosh retire?

Chris Bosh last played in 2016.

What is Chris Bosh's net worth?

Chris Bosh made at least $242,110,053 playing professional basketball.

How much did Chris Bosh make?

Chris Bosh made $26,837,720 in 2019.

What did Chris Bosh average?

Chris Bosh averaged 19.2 points, 8.5 rebounds, and 2.0 assists per game.

How many rings does Chris Bosh have?

Chris Bosh won 2 championships.

What is Chris Bosh's Twitter account?

Chris Bosh is on Twitter at chrisbosh.

What schools did Chris Bosh attend?

Chris Bosh attended Lincoln in Dallas, Texas and Georgia Tech.

What are Chris Bosh's nicknames?

CB4, The Boshtrich, Boshasaurus, King of the Dragons are nicknames for Chris Bosh.
